derivation: from H410 (אֵל) and H7069 (קָנָה); God has obtained;
outline:
Elkanah = "God has possessed" or "God has created"
  1. Samuel's father
  2. a ruler in Jerusalem in the time of king Ahaz
  3. one of David's mighty warriors
  4. son of Korah
  5. several Levites
strongs_def: Elkanah, the name of several Israelites
